Highlight Entities with Colors

Source: vignettes/highlight_text.Rmd
highlight_text.Rmd

Create Text with Named Entities 

library(flaiR)
data("de_immigration")
de_immigration <- de_immigration[5,]
tagger_ner <- load_tagger_ner("de-ner")
#> 2023-10-04 14:24:17,889 SequenceTagger predicts: Dictionary with 19 tags: O, S-LOC, B-LOC, E-LOC, I-LOC, S-PER, B-PER, E-PER, I-PER, S-ORG, B-ORG, E-ORG, I-ORG, S-MISC, B-MISC, E-MISC, I-MISC, <START>, <STOP>
result <- get_entities(de_immigration$text,
                       tagger = tagger_ner,
                       show.text_id = FALSE
                       )
#> Warning in check_texts_and_ids(texts, doc_ids): doc_ids is NULL.
#> Auto-assigning doc_ids.

Â 

Highlight Text with Entities 

highlighted_text <- highlight_text(text = de_immigration$text, 
                                   entities_mapping = map_entities(result))
highlighted_text
